about_the_game:
KILL YOUR FRIENDS.

DIE TRYING.

A Special Place In Hell is a retro fast-paced top-down battle royale where you'll stab, slash, shoot and ambush up to 8 of your friends or fail miserably at it (you still get to point and laugh at them as a ghost).

  • 2 to 8 player versus multiplayer
  • fast-paced quick matches
  • Cheaper than buying lunch
  • Randomized levels
  • spooky scary easter eggs
  • funne scream material for your dying let's play channel
  • use the environment to sneak up and ambush other players
  • catch a speeding bullet with your bare hands
  • deflect a flying knife with your own
  • when you die you can harass your friends and give out their position as a ghost its funi

content_descriptors.notes: 4-bit depictions of blood, killing, violence and guttural spooky screams.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 115 MB available space
  • VR Support: none

short_description: Scavenge for weapons, ambush your friends, die trying. A Special Place In Hell is an 8-man fast-paced top-down battle royale-lite inspired by 4-bit games of the Atari 2600 era.
